channel.title: Solutions on Mohit Kanwar's App : My Cents
channel.description: Recent content in Solutions on Mohit Kanwar's App : My Cents

item.title: Channel Banking
item.description: Comprehensive documentation for a Channel Banking application covering SDLC processes, mobile and web apps, APIs, admin tools, and reporting. Supports retail and business banking use cases with detailed project, architecture, and development insights.

item.title: Self Hosted Captcha
item.description: Design and implement a secure, self-hosted CAPTCHA service. Learn about features, accessibility, integration, and architecture for protecting applications from bots while ensuring a seamless user experience.
